alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 4:58PM CDT until September 04 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... North central Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Humnoke, or 13 miles west of Stuttgart, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lonoke... England... Humnoke... Keo... Brummitt... Toltec Mounds State Park... Scott... Allport... Coy... Bevis Corner... Toltec... Culler... Tomberlin... Pettus... Seaton... Blakemore... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
